entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
